alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 3:17AM EST until February 28 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Western Franklin, Western Hampshire and Western Hampden Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult Monday night. The hazardous conditions will impact the Tuesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow overspreads western Massachusetts between 7 pm and 10 pm. The heaviest snow and lowest visibility occurs from late Monday evening into the overnight. Snow continues to accumulate Tuesday, but at a lighter intensity. Given this, road conditions will slowly improve, especially Tuesday afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire
